Ingredients Calories Prep time Preparation 1.Add the gin, lemon juice, maraschino liqueur, and creme de violette to a cocktail shaker. Fill it with ice and shake it for 30sec.\n2.Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a Luxardo cherry, if desired. Timer
